summary:
Armory of Conan by Garrymorrowind and Krypt
Retextures I have done for the Vanir Helmets
A realistic Thulsa Doom Dagger with movie quality textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#980000][size=6]Armory of Conan by Garrymorrowind & Krypt[/size][/color]
[/center][youtube]Hc2KD86_h24[/youtube][youtube]gpDLBRZVi_4[/youtube]

The Vanir Helmet Bronzed & Black editions. A few people have asked me if I would release these so here they are.
A realistic Fangs of the Serpent dagger from the Conan the Barbarian movie.
[center][color=#674ea7][size=5]
Version 1.0[/size][/color][/center]
Initial release
Vanir Royal Guard Helmet
Vanir Bronzed Guard Helmet
Fangs of the Serpent dagger (This dagger is included in the leveled lists. New normal maps for the dagger and retexture based on the Arnold [i]Schwarzenegger[/i]. Conan the Barbarian movie.)

[center][color=#1e84cc][size=5]Locations[/size][/color][/center]
Anywhere you will have a steel dagger in the leveled list you might be able to find this dagger as well.
You can craft the helmets and dagger under the Steel section at any forge.
Recipes for Vanir Royal Guard Helmet are 1 piece of charcoal and 1 Ebony Ingot with a tempering of 1 Ebony Ingot.
Recipes for Vanir Guard Helmet are 2 Dwarven Ingots and 1 Steel Ingot with a tempering of 1 Dwarven and Steel Ingots.

[center][color=#ffe599][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/center]
There are no requirements to craft the new helmets or dagger.

[center][size=6]Tools Used
[/size]Autodesk 3DS Max 2012
Nifscope
Creation Kit
Gimp

[color=#00ff00][size=5]Credits[/size][/color]
Krypt
Garrymorrowind
[/center]
author: Krypt and garrymorrowind
